T02D1245:189a-1: bhra ma h'a ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1245:189a-3: 'khrul pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1245:189a-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1245:189a-5: sa la zhabs mnan byin pa'i shugs kyis rgya mtshor rnam par bskyod //
T02D1245:189a-6: 'jigs pa'i dus kyi sprin ltar zhal rnams kyis ni sgra 'byin zhing //
T02D1245:189a-7: phyag gi nags tshal rlung gis ri yi rtse mo 'gul nas 'phen //
T02D1245:189a-8: he ru ka yi gar gyis khyed rnams 'jigs pa sel ba yin //
T02D1245:189a-9: zhal gdong re rer spyan gsum pa //
T02D1245:189a-10: zhabs bzhi yis ni 'jigs mdzad cing //
T02D1245:189a-11: phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa'i //
T02D1245:189a-12: dgyes rdor sgrub thabs bshad par bya //
T02D1245:189a-14: bzlas pa la dbang bar gyur pa'i sngags pa nang par sngar langs te /
T02D1245:189a-15: snying gar nyi ma la sa bon bsams la //
T02D1245:189a-16: gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1245:189a-17: aom raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1245:189a-18: zhes bya bas gnas dang bdag nyid dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas nas /
T02D1245:189a-19: dri dang me tog la sogs pa dri zhim po
T02D1245:189a-20: dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su zhugs la
T02D1245:189b-0: / @189b stan bde ba la skyil mo krung bcas te /
T02D1245:189b-1: mchod yon la sngags yongs su bzlas nas snying ga'i
T02D1245:189b-2: sngags kyi 'od zer gyis mdun gyi nam mkha' la
T02D1245:189b-3: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te
T02D1245:189b-4: / bltas nas snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i
T02D1245:189b-5: dkar mo la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyis mchod
T02D1245:189b-6: / par bya'o // de la dkar mo ni ri bong can 'dzin no //
T02D1245:189b-7: chom rkun ma ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1245:189b-9: za phod ma ni stobs so //
T02D1245:189b-11: ri khrod ma ni sbrang rtsi'o //
T02D1245:189b-12: gtum mo ni cang te'u rdung ba'o //
T02D1245:189b-13: g-yung mo ni skyes bu bzhin du mgul pa nas 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1245:189b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdun du
T02D1245:189b-15: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa 'di ltar bya
T02D1245:189b-16: ste / bdag gis sdig pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la so sor bshags so //
T02D1245:189b-17: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa
T02D1245:189b-18: dang so so'i skye bo thams cad la rjes su
T02D1245:189b-19: yi rang ngo // bdag gis dge ba thams cad
T02D1245:189b-20: kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1245:189b-21: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
T02D1245:189b-22: bdag nyid byang chub kyi bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1245:189b-23: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1245:189b-24: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1245:189b-25: ae ma'o sems can thams cad kyi don phan pa
T02D1245:189b-26: dang bde ba'i phyir bdag bla na med pa yang
T02D1245:189b-27: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
T02D1245:189b-29: mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1245:189b-30: la thug gi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
T02D1245:189b-32: 'di ltar bdag nyid bla na med pa yang dag
T02D1245:189b-33: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam rdo rje theg
T02D1245:189b-35: de nas sems can thams cad la khyad par du
T02D1245:189b-36: 'phags pa'i lha'i bde pa dang mi 'bral bar gnas
T02D1245:189b-37: pa'i rnam pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1245:189b-38: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i lam la sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1245:189b-39: de nas chos thams cad la yid kyis dmigs nas dpyad par bya ste /
T02D1245:189b-40: 'di dag ni sems nyid de dang de'i rnam par 'phrul par snang ste /
T02D1245:190a-0: @190a * // dper na rmi lam bzhin du sems las phyi rol na sems kyi gzung ba med do //
T02D1245:190a-1: gzung ba dngos po med pa'i phyir sems kyang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med de /
T02D1245:190a-2: de'i phyir chos thams cad ni sems kyi lus te /
T02D1245:190a-3: de dag gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa nyid la don dam pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1245:190a-4: de ltar mtha' gcig tu nges nas 'khrul par sgro
T02D1245:190a-5: btags pas 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma'i chos thams cad kyi
T02D1245:190a-6: rnam pa spangs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gnyis
T02D1245:190a-7: su med pa rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid 'ba'
T02D1245:190a-8: zhig tu blta'o // 'di ni dam pa'i byang chub
T02D1245:190a-9: kyi sems 'jig rten las 'das pa stong pa nyid
T02D1245:190a-10: kyi ye shes spros dang bral zhing rnam par rtog
T02D1245:190a-11: pa dang bral ba zhes bstan to //
T02D1245:190a-12: de nas de'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab ste /
T02D1245:190a-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dznya na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1245:190a-14: de nyid bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste /
T02D1245:190a-15: de nyid mchog tu bsrung ba'o //
T02D1245:190a-16: de nas de'i rgyu mthun par gyur pa rnam pa
T02D1245:190a-17: dang bcas pa dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes
T02D1245:190a-18: kyi rang bzhin gyi bsrung ba bsgom par bya ste
T02D1245:190a-19: // mdun du ram las nyi ma rnam par bsgom bya zhing //
T02D1245:190a-20: nyi ma de las h'u% byung sna tshogs rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02D1245:190a-21: rdo rje de nyid kyis kyang rnam par bsgom bya ba //
T02D1245:190a-22: rab dang ni gur yang rab tu bcing ba'o //
T02D1245:190a-23: sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer 'jigs pa'i me ltar
T02D1245:190a-24: bzod par dka' ba rnams kyis thams cad du spros
T02D1245:190a-25: nas gtams par gyur pas logs la rdo rje'i rab
T02D1245:190a-27: steng du rdo rje'i gur dang /
T02D1245:190a-28: 'og tu yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi gzhi 'og
T02D1245:190a-29: gi sa gzhi la thug par gyur pa blta bar
T02D1245:190a-30: bya'o // de nas nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer du gyur te /
T02D1245:190a-31: phyogs phyogs su spros nas gtams par gyur pas phyi
T02D1245:190a-32: rol thag ring por mtshams gcad par bya'o zhes pa
T02D1245:190a-33: ni tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
T02D1245:190a-34: de nas de'i rgyu mthun par gyur pa ste nyid
T02D1245:190a-35: kyi 'byung ba chen po lnga rnam par dag pa
T02D1245:190a-37: de la nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po chos 'byung
T02D1245:190a-38: zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rang
T02D1245:190a-39: bzhin ston ka'i zla ba bzhin dkar ba 'og phra
T02D1245:190a-41: gru gsum pa nang nam mkha'i rang bzhin nang du
T02D1245:190a-42: padma 'dab ma sna tshogs pa skyes pa'i snying po
T02D1245:190b-0: @190b la sna tshogs rdo rje rgya chen po gnas
T02D1245:190b-1: pa'o // de'i dbus su 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i
T02D1245:190b-2: dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin
T02D1245:190b-3: gong nas gong du blta bar bya ste /
T02D1245:190b-4: dang por yi ge lam las dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D1245:190b-5: 'khor chen po gru bzhi pa ser po grvar rdo
T02D1245:190b-6: rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1245:190b-7: de nas pam las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar ba bum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1245:190b-8: de nas ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po grvar ram gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1245:190b-9: de nas yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam
T02D1245:190b-10: pa nag po mtha' ma gnyis su dar dpyang g-yo
T02D1245:190b-11: bas mtshan pa'o // sgom pa pos yang de'i tshe
T02D1245:190b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khyab par byed
T02D1245:190b-13: pa de nyid kho na gnas so //
T02D1245:190b-14: de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su
T02D1245:190b-15: 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1245:190b-16: skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdus pa'i
T02D1245:190b-17: ngo bo // thar pa chen po'i khang pa rnam
T02D1245:190b-18: par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin rin po che sna
T02D1245:190b-19: tshogs las gyur pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten
T02D1245:190b-20: gyi khams thams cad bdag med par ston pa'i dur
T02D1245:190b-21: khrod brgyad kyis nye bar bskor ba bsgom par bya'o
T02D1245:190b-22: ngo bo // // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1245:190b-23: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1245:190b-24: stegs bu bzhi yis yongs su bskor //
T02D1245:190b-25: tva ra na ni bzhis brgyan zhing //
T02D1245:190b-26: do shal dang ni do phyed dang //
T02D1245:190b-27: dar dang me tog phreng ba dang //
T02D1245:190b-28: bla re me long rnga yab dang //
T02D1245:190b-29: rdo rje thig skud rnams kyis mdzes //
T02D1245:190b-31: g-yo zhing bkra ba'i ba dan mchog //
T02D1245:190b-32: phyogs kyi sgo la dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1245:190b-33: 'dod pa lnga po mchog rnams dang //
T02D1245:190b-34: dam pa'i mchod pa rnam lngas spras //
T02D1245:190b-35: de yi nang gi rim pa las //
T02D1245:190b-37: sgo bzhi dang ni gru bzhi dang //
T02D1245:190b-38: dbus ma dag tu stan dag ni //
T02D1245:190b-39: tshangs dbang nye dbang drag po dang //
T02D1245:190b-40: gshin rje gnod sbyin yang de bzhin //
T02D1245:190b-41: bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D1245:190b-42: dbus su bdud rtsi bzhi pa ste //
T02D1245:190b-43: gong nas gong du bkan pa'o //
T02D1245:190b-44: 'jigs ldan bdud ni bzhi po yi //
T02D1245:190b-45: snying ga dag tu nyi mas mnan //
T02D1245:190b-46: 'jigs pa gzhan yang zla bas so //
T02D1245:191a-0: de yi dbus kyi gdan gyi steng du dbyangs @191a * //
T02D1245:191a-1: yig bco lngas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1245:191a-2: de'i steng du gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhis nyi
T02D1245:191a-3: ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1245:191a-4: rang bzhin dang / de'i dbus su aom dang h'u%
T02D1245:191a-5: yongs su gyur pa las gri gug dang thod pa'i
T02D1245:191a-6: dbus su rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan pa so
T02D1245:191a-7: sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsam par
T02D1245:191a-8: rang bzhin dang / bya'o // de nas sa bon
T02D1245:191a-9: gnyis las rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i rnam pa dang
T02D1245:191a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su spros nas
T02D1245:191a-11: slar 'dus te sa bon dang lhan cig tu gyur
T02D1245:191a-12: pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so
T02D1245:191a-13: rang bzhin dang / bya'o // // de nas zla
T02D1245:191a-14: ba dang nyi ma dang mtshan ma dang sa bon
T02D1245:191a-15: yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D1245:191a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' 'chad par 'gyur ba'i kha dog
T02D1245:191a-17: dang rnam pa dang mtshan ma la sogs pa rnams
T02D1245:191a-18: rang bzhin dang / bya'o // // kyis / dpal
T02D1245:191a-19: he ru ka'i gzugs su bskyed cing de bzhin du
T02D1245:191a-20: bdag med mas mgul nas 'khyud pa ni shin tu
T02D1245:191a-21: rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D1245:191a-22: kyi bdag nyid du blta'o zhes pa ni mngon par
T02D1245:191a-23: rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1245:191a-24: ho:gnyis kyi ni bar gnas pa'i //
T02D1245:191a-25: 'bar ba'i sa bon gnyis po ni //
T02D1245:191a-26: dga' ldan de yi zhal nas zhugs //
T02D1245:191a-27: padma'i mtha' ru chags pas zhu //
T02D1245:191a-28: de nas rdo rje chags chen gyis //
T02D1245:191a-29: rig ma dang ni lhan cig zhu //
T02D1245:191a-30: ston ka'i zla ba dang 'dra bar //
T02D1245:191a-31: de ni zlum por gyur nas gnas //
T02D1245:191a-32: de nas zla gdan grvar gnas pa'o //
T02D1245:191a-33: lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni //
T02D1245:191a-34: rdo rje'i glu ni bzhi dag gis //
T02D1245:191a-35: bzhengs phyir de la skul bar byed //
T02D1245:191a-36: rje btsun snying rje'i yid kyis bzhengs //
T02D1245:191a-37: spos mo bdag la yongs su skyobs //
T02D1245:191a-38: stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin spongs la //
T02D1245:191a-39: bde chen 'dod pas bdag la sbyor //
T02D1245:191a-40: khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1245:191a-41: kye yi rdo rje khyed bzhengs shig / stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin spongs la //
T02D1245:191a-42: ri khrod dgos pa sgrub mdzod cig / gtso bo 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas //
T02D1245:191a-43: ci phyir stong pa nyid la bzhugs //
T02D1245:191a-44: khyod mi bzhugs na phyogs rmongs pas //
T02D1245:191a-45: gtum mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1245:191a-46: mig 'phrul lta bu khyod bzhengs shig / bdag gis khyed kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1245:191b-0: @191b sme mo bdag ni mkhas par dgongs //
T02D1245:191b-1: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / de nas glu yi dor byas te //
T02D1245:191b-2: zhu ba bsdus pa las skyes pa //
T02D1245:191b-3: de'i dbus su byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aam dang h'um gnyis dang /
T02D1245:191b-5: lus la sogs pa nam mkha' lta bu dang sgyu ma lta bur nges par byas nas /
T02D1245:191b-6: de yongs su gyur pa la brten pa'i ting nge
T02D1245:191b-7: 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyi gri gug dang thod pa
T02D1245:191b-8: gnyis sbyor ba'i snying po la yang dag par ji
T02D1245:191b-9: lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1245:191b-10: lha'i sa bon gnyis dang ldan pa blta bar bya'o
T02D1245:191b-11: // de nas de nyid las rnal 'byor gyis de
T02D1245:191b-12: bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnal
T02D1245:191b-13: 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i rnam pa spros te //
T02D1245:191b-14: thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin du nges par byas nas /
T02D1245:191b-15: yang slar rnal 'byor gyis bsdus te /
T02D1245:191b-16: de dag thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang nam
T02D1245:191b-17: mkha' lta bu yongs su shes nas nyi ma gnyis
T02D1245:191b-18: dang mtshan ma dang sa bon rnams yongs su gyur
T02D1245:191b-19: pa las skyes pa'i bdag nyid he ru kar blta
T02D1245:191b-20: bar bya'o // zhabs rnams kyis ni stang stabs dang //
T02D1245:191b-21: lha dang lha min la sdigs mdzub //
T02D1245:191b-22: spyan ni gdug cing zlum la dmar //
T02D1245:191b-23: lang tsho gzhon zhing 'gying bag can //
T02D1245:191b-24: zhabs bzhi dang ni zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1245:191b-25: brgyad gnyis phyag gis nyer brgyan cing //
T02D1245:191b-26: bdud bzhi dag ni yang dag mnan //
T02D1245:191b-27: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar byed pas //
T02D1245:191b-28: mgo phreng do shal chen po dang //
T02D1245:191b-30: spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1245:191b-32: zhal nas h'u% ni spro bar byed //
T02D1245:191b-33: thal ba dag gis sku la byugs //
T02D1245:191b-34: rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag chen po //
T02D1245:191b-35: g-yas ni kunda dag dang mtshungs //
T02D1245:191b-36: g-yon pa mi bzad chen po dmar //
T02D1245:191b-37: spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1245:191b-38: lhag ma'i zhal ni phung ba 'dra //
T02D1245:191b-39: zhal gdong re rer spyan gsum pa //
T02D1245:191b-41: gdug dang rgod dang 'jigs par byed //
T02D1245:191b-42: snying rje ngo mtshar zhi ba dang //
T02D1245:191b-43: gar dgu yi ni ro dang ldan //
T02D1245:191b-44: dbus skra kham ser gyen du phyogs //
T02D1245:191b-45: 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang //
T02D1245:191b-46: lag gdub dang ni ska rags kyi //
T02D1245:192a-0: @192a * // phyag rgya lnga yis yongs su brgyan //
T02D1245:192a-1: glang po rta bong glang rnga mo //
T02D1245:192a-2: mi dang sha ra bha byi la //
T02D1245:192a-3: g-yas kyi thod par go rims bzhin //
T02D1245:192a-4: glang po la sogs shes par bya //
T02D1245:192a-5: sa dang chu dang rlung rnams dang //
T02D1245:192a-6: me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid //
T02D1245:192a-7: gnod sbyin dang ni nor lha ste //
T02D1245:192a-8: de dag g-yon gyi thod brgyad du //
T02D1245:192a-9: bdag med ma yis 'khyud pa ste //
T02D1245:192a-10: rang gi lta bu'i phyag rgya lnga //
T02D1245:192a-11: phyag gnyis zhal gcig zhabs gnyis pa //
T02D1245:192a-12: de yang gri gug thod pa 'dzin //
T02D1245:192a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma
T02D1245:192a-14: la thod pa gnas pa'i steng du nyi ma la
T02D1245:192a-15: h'u% ste / bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs kar yang zla ba la gri gug gnas pa //
T02D1245:192a-16: de'i yu bar zla ba la aam bsam par bya'o //
T02D1245:192a-17: de nas de'i rna ba la bdag med ma mig la rdo rje ma /
T02D1245:192a-18: sna la gsang ba'i dkar mo //
T02D1245:192a-20: lus kyi dbang po la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yid la bdag med ma bsam par bya'o //
T02D1245:192a-21: rdo rje ma la sogs pa lnga po de dag nyid go rims bzhin du gzugs dang /
T02D1245:192a-25: rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams la'o //
T02D1245:192a-30: zhe sdang rnams la yang de bzhin no ;
T02D1245:192a-36: chos kyi skye mched rnams la phyi'i dkar mo dang /
T02D1245:192a-45: rlung gi khams rnams la spos mo dang /
T02D1245:192a-56: rkang dang tshil gnyis la g-yung mo'o //
T02D1245:192a-57: pags pa la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no //
T02D1245:192a-58: rus pa la bden pa bzhi ste /
T02D1245:192a-59: de ltar na thams cad lhar gyur pa yin no //
T02D1245:192a-60: de'i rnam par dag pa gzhan yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D1245:192a-61: snying rje yi ni spyan dmar la //
T02D1245:192a-62: yan lag nag po byams pa'i thugs //
T02D1245:192a-63: zhabs ni bsdu ba'i dngos po ste //
T02D1245:192a-64: bcu drug phyag ni stong pa nyid //
T02D1245:192a-65: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D1245:192b-0: de nyid @192b gsum ni spyan gsum mo //
T02D1245:192b-1: phyag rgya lnga ni rgyal ba lnga //
T02D1245:192b-2: khro bos gdug pa rjes su 'dul //
T02D1245:192b-3: mgrin snying bha ga spyi bo la //
T02D1245:192b-4: 'khor lo bzhi ni go rims bzhin //
T02D1245:192b-5: longs spyod rdzogs dang chos sprul dang //
T02D1245:192b-6: bde ba chen po de brjod pa //
T02D1245:192b-7: chu skyes 'dab ma bcu drug brgyad //
T02D1245:192b-8: drug cu rtsa bzhi sum cu gnyis //
T02D1245:192b-9: aom dang h'u% dang a'a:dang ni //
T02D1245:192b-10: ham rnams kyis ni dbus su brgyan //
T02D1245:192b-11: de'i rjes la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las
T02D1245:192b-12: spros pa'i 'od zer lcags kyu rnams kyis phyogs bcu
T02D1245:192b-13: na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs
T02D1245:192b-14: te / nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol la /
T02D1245:192b-15: de dag la lha mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1245:192b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1245:192b-17: de nas de dag dpal he ru ka'i gzugs su gyur pa rnams kyis /
T02D1245:192b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyis bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D1245:192b-19: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i spyi bor bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa bskyed do //
T02D1245:192b-20: de'i mdun du me tog gi char dang gur kum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1245:192b-22: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod do //
T02D1245:192b-23: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang rdo rje'i
T02D1245:192b-24: glus bstod do zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rnal
T02D1245:192b-25: 'byor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang po ngo
T02D1245:192b-26: bo nyid kyi sku bstan to //
T02D1245:192b-27: de nas padma byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D1245:192b-28: aom padma su kh'a dha r'a ma h'a r'a ga
T02D1245:192b-29: su kham datta tsa tu r'a nanda bha ga bi
T02D1245:192b-30: shva h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru shva me /
T02D1245:192b-31: de nas rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D1245:192b-32: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tu r'a nanda
T02D1245:192b-33: d'a ya ka kha ga mu ka ae ka ra
T02D1245:192b-34: so n'a tha h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru shva me
T02D1245:192b-35: / de nas aom sh'i sh'i ha sv'a h'a /
T02D1245:192b-37: de nas padma'i nang du ltung ba'i zla ba zhu ba'i thigs pa yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1245:192b-38: gam gis grub pa'i dkar mo kha dog nag mo
T02D1245:192b-39: gri gug dang ro hi ta'i nya 'dzin pa shar
T02D1245:192b-40: gyi sgor zla ba'i gdan la bsam mo //
T02D1245:192b-41: de bzhin du tsa% gis chom rkun ma btsod kyi mdog can cang te'u dang phag 'dzin pa /
T02D1245:192b-43: de bzhin du ba% gyis ro langs ma gser gyi
T02D1245:192b-44: mdog can rus sbal dang thod pa 'dzin pa nub
T02D1245:192b-45: kyi sgor zla ba'i gdan la'o //
T02D1245:193a-1: bzhin du gha% gis za phod ma margad kyi mdog can sprul dang rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa /
T02D1245:193a-2: byang gi sgor zla ba'i gdan la'o //
T02D1245:193a-3: de bzhin du pa% gis spos mo aa nda rnyil
T02D1245:193a-4: gyi mdog can seng ge dang dgra sta 'dzin pa
T02D1245:193a-5: dbang ldan gyi grva'i gdan la'o //
T02D1245:193a-6: de bzhin du sa% gis ri khrod ma chu shel
T02D1245:193a-7: gyi kha dog lta bu dge slong dang 'khar gsil
T02D1245:193a-9: de bzhin du la% gis gtum mo nam mkha' ltar
T02D1245:193a-10: sngo bsangs can 'khor lo dang gshol 'dzin pa bden
T02D1245:193a-12: de bzhin du da% gis g-yung mo kha dog sna
T02D1245:193a-13: tshogs pa rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub byed pa rlung
T02D1245:193a-14: gi grvar zla ba'i gdan la bsam par bya'o //
T02D1245:193a-15: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs //
T02D1245:193a-16: zlum zhing dmar ba'i spyin gsum pa //
T02D1245:193a-17: phyag gnyis skra kham gyen du phyogs //
T02D1245:193a-18: phyag rgya lnga 'dzin de dag kyang //
T02D1245:193a-19: de nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la bltas nas /
T02D1245:193a-20: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyu
T02D1245:193a-21: rnams kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te
T02D1245:193a-22: / shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par phyogs shing bar snang la bzhugs pa la /
T02D1245:193a-23: zhal brgyad nas h'u% rnams kyis bgegs bskrad de mchod yon dang zhabs bsil phul nas /
T02D1245:193a-24: dza:h'u% ba% ho: zhes bya bas go rims bzhin du
T02D1245:193a-25: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang
T02D1245:193a-26: du byas nas / dam tshig dang ye shes kyi
T02D1245:193a-27: dkyil 'khor gnyis gcig tu 'dres par bsgom zhing rnam
T02D1245:193a-28: du byas nas / par bsgoms la / snying ga'i
T02D1245:193a-29: sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1245:193a-30: thams cad spyan drangs nas yang dag par mchod do
T02D1245:193a-31: du byas nas / par bsgoms la / / gsol
T02D1245:193a-32: ba btab la dbang bskur ba byin par bsam mo
T02D1245:193a-33: du byas nas / par bsgoms la / / //
T02D1245:193a-34: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa la dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1245:193a-35: rgyal bas mgo bor bskyed do //
T02D1245:193a-37: spos mo la sogs bzhi po dag dang ni //
T02D1245:193a-38: dkar mo la sogs dag la rim bzhin du //
T02D1245:193a-39: snying ga'i mi bskyod sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung //
T02D1245:193a-40: ngag dbang rnams kyi skabs 'dir phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1245:193a-41: lus dang ngag sems rigs bdag rnams kyis ni //
T02D1245:193a-42: srid dang myang 'das he ru ka rnams la'o //
T02D1245:193a-43: rdo rje ma sogs la ni rigs kyi bdag / lnga po rgyal ba mi bskyod sogs rnams kyi //
T02D1245:193b-0: de @193b nas lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid yid la bya ste /
T02D1245:193b-1: 'dir lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnams kyi chos thams cad basbus la /
T02D1245:193b-2: lus la sogs pa de dag chos nyid rnam par
T02D1245:193b-3: rig pa tsam gnyis kyis stong pa nyid gang yin
T02D1245:193b-4: pa de dag la so sor rtog pa ni /
T02D1245:193b-5: ci rigs par sgo skyong rnams kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D1245:193b-6: stong pa nyid de nyid kyis yang dag pa'i ye
T02D1245:193b-7: shes gang yin pa spros pa dang bral ba zag
T02D1245:193b-8: pa med pa'i shes rab bla na med pa'i rdo
T02D1245:193b-9: rje theg pa ni ci rigs par sbos mo la
T02D1245:193b-10: sogs pa bzhi'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D1245:193b-11: rdo rje theg pa de nyid kyis 'bras bu rdo
T02D1245:193b-12: rje 'dzin pa chen po'i go 'phang gong na med
T02D1245:193b-13: pa'i byang chub ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i de
T02D1245:193b-15: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad yang dag par spros te /
T02D1245:193b-16: yang dag par spros pa'i sprin rnams kyis nam mkha' gang bar gyur pas /
T02D1245:193b-17: gtso bo dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1245:193b-18: de nas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mos par byas nas /
T02D1245:193b-19: glu gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1245:193b-20: sna tshogs du ma'i sgeg dang lta ba rnams kyis rab tu dga' //
T02D1245:193b-21: sna tshogs du ma'i 'od dang 'khyug pa rnams kyis rab tu dga' //
T02D1245:193b-22: sna tshogs du ma'i bde ba'i ston mo rnams kyang rab tu gsol //
T02D1245:193b-23: sna tshogs du ma'i sdom pa chen po rnams ni rab tu ston //
T02D1245:193b-24: nam mkha' kun gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1245:193b-25: nam mkha'i dam tshig la zhugs shing //
T02D1245:193b-26: 'jig rten ma lus pa rnams ni //
T02D1245:193b-27: nam mkha' thams cad kyis gsol lo //
T02D1245:193b-28: de nas bar snang la h'u% las rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D1245:193b-29: de'i 'og tu aa las padma ste /
T02D1245:193b-30: de'i dbus su rdzas rnams la aom gyis mtshan nas /
T02D1245:193b-31: rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags chen po'i me 'bar te /
T02D1245:193b-32: des de rnams bskol zhing smin pa zhu bar byas
T02D1245:193b-33: nas ye shes kyi nyi ma'i snang bar gyur te
T02D1245:193b-34: / de dag gi 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i
T02D1245:193b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs snang bar
T02D1245:193b-36: / byas nas / 'od zer de dag nyid kyis
T02D1245:193b-37: de dag gi ye shes kyi sa bon las ye
T02D1245:193b-38: shes kyi bdud rtsi blangs nas /
T02D1245:193b-39: der lhung zhing 'dres par byas la /
T02D1245:194a-1: bdud rtsir gyur nas yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis
T02D1245:194a-2: brlabs la lce la h'um dang rdo rje mchog dang
T02D1245:194a-3: / snying gar nyi ma la dkyil 'khor mos par byas nas /
T02D1245:194a-4: de dag gi bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D1245:194a-5: ma mo'i 'khor lo nyams dga' bar //
T02D1245:194a-6: rlabs dang bral ba'i bde ba thob //
T02D1245:194a-7: rlabs med pa yi rang bzhin can //
T02D1245:194a-9: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1245:194a-10: de nas dkar mo dang chom rkun ma dang /
T02D1245:194a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i bar du re re nas
T02D1245:194a-12: rim gyis phyogs bcur rgyun mi 'chad par spros te
T02D1245:194a-13: / sems can rnams kyi don byas nas /
T02D1245:194a-14: de nyid du bsdus pa ni bya ba byas pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1245:194a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yang spros pa dang bral ba'i bde ba steng bar blta ste /
T02D1245:194a-16: de la dkar mos ni lus kyi de kho na
T02D1245:194a-17: nyid la so sor rtog pa la sems can rnams
T02D1245:194a-18: rnam par gnas par byed do //
T02D1245:194a-19: chom rkun mas ni sems kyi'o //
T02D1245:194a-20: ro langs mas ni ngag gi'o //
T02D1245:194a-21: za phod mas ni ye shes kyi'o //
T02D1245:194a-22: sbos mos ni lus kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes la'o //
T02D1245:194a-23: ri khrod mas ni sems kyi'o //
T02D1245:194a-25: sme mos ni ye shes kyi'o //
T02D1245:194a-26: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag pos kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1245:194a-27: chen po'i go 'phang la sems can rnams gnas par
T02D1245:194a-28: byed do // de nas yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor gyis mnyam bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1245:194a-29: nag po dmar po de nas ser //
T02D1245:194a-30: ljang sngon dkar po rim pa las //
T02D1245:194a-31: lhan cig skyes dga' tsam du ni //
T02D1245:194a-32: 'khor lo gtso byas bsam par bya //
T02D1245:194a-33: las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa sprul ba'i sku'o //
T02D1245:194a-34: bsgom pas skyon sngags bzla bar bya ste /
T02D1245:194a-35: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa lha'i gzugs su brtan par rnam par bsams la /
T02D1245:194a-36: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1245:194a-37: snying gar sngags kyi yi ge bcu gsum mgo gyen
T02D1245:194a-38: du 'greng ba mar me ltar 'bar zhing zlum por
T02D1245:194a-39: gyur par yid kyis mngon par bris nas brjod par
T02D1245:194a-40: bya ba ni / rdo rje'i tshig dang khro bo'i
T02D1245:194b-0: tshig tu bzlas pas de @194b dag bzla bar bya
T02D1245:194b-1: bya ba ni / ste / zhal thams cad dang /
T02D1245:194b-2: lha mo'i zhal thams cad sngags 'don par mos par bya'o //
T02D1245:194b-3: 'di nyid ni lha mo thams cad kyi bzlas pa
T02D1245:194b-4: las lha rang nyid kyi bzlas pa brgya 'gyur du
T02D1245:194b-6: de nas smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02D1245:194b-7: dge ba gang thob de dag gis //
T02D1245:194b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi nor thams cad //
T02D1245:194b-10: 'gro ba lnga yis thob par shog / byang chub rdo rje sngags pa yis //
T02D1245:194b-11: rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir spyod dang //
T02D1245:194b-12: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa gang //
T02D1245:194b-13: bdag ni de gnyis spyod par shog / de nas
T02D1245:194b-14: gtso bo dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin
T02D1245:194b-15: du yang dag par mchod nas rang gi snying ga'i
T02D1245:194b-16: sngags la lha mo nang du bsgoms te /
T02D1245:194b-17: rten gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu yang yangs par mos par byas la /
T02D1245:194b-18: 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni sbos mo la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du nges par byas nas /
T02D1245:194b-19: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis ldang bar bya ste /
T02D1245:194b-20: de nas bzlas pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1245:194b-21: gnyid kyi dus su yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor
T02D1245:194b-22: ram lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i rnal 'byor mngon
T02D1245:194b-23: du byas la gnyid log go //
T02D1245:194b-24: lha mo bzhi'i yang dag pa'i glus bskul nas gnyid las ldang bar bya ste /
T02D1245:194b-25: langs nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1245:194b-26: de bzhin du nyi ma re re zhing dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i bar du blta'o //
T02D1245:194b-27: de dag mthong nas go rims bzhin du mthong bar
T02D1245:194b-28: 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ngo bo la rjes su
T02D1245:194b-29: gnas par bya'o // yon tan lci ba'i 'byung gnas zhal brgyad he ru ka'i /
T02D1245:194b-30: sgrub thabs 'khrul pa spong ba zhes bya gsal bar brjod pa yis //
T02D1245:194b-31: dge ba gang zhig thob pa 'di yis skye la
T02D1245:194b-32: brten pa bdag / dus rnams kun du phan pa'i
T02D1245:194b-33: rgyu des rdo rje rgyal bar shog / slob dpon
